original_title: VeggieTales: MacLarry and the Stinky Cheese Battle
overview: Larry the Cucumber stars as MacLarry- a misfit inventor who is stuck in the middle of the silliest battle every between two tribes of perpetual pranksters! Follow MacLarry as he realizes that his God-given talents may be just what is needed to save them all from the stinkiest cheese in the land!
tagline: A Lesson in Getting Along with Others
title: VeggieTales: MacLarry and the Stinky Cheese Battle
